title: Couple With Heart: Man, Person, Medium Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Couple With Heart: Man, Person, Medium Light Skin Tone
description: A couple composed of a man and a person, with a heart between them, and specified with medium-light skin tones. Represents romantic love and partnership.
apple_vendor_description: The couple with heart emoji on Apple devices beautifully illustrates a man and a person with a medium-light skin tone, united by a vibrant red heart. Apple‚Äôs characteristic glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients give the figures a warm, inviting presence, while soft rounded edges ensure a gentle, affectionate portrayal. This emoji, as it appears on Apple devices, is a universal symbol of love, partnership, and deep connection, often used to celebrate relationships.
